titleStmt.title: Gods promise to his plantation· as it was delivered in a sermon, by Iohn Cotton, B.D. and preacher of Gods word in Boston.
titleStmt.author: Cotton, John, 1584-1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Iones of Iohn Bellamy, and are to be solde at the three Golden Lyons by the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Preached to John Winthrop's company at Southampton just before they embarked in 1630.
One of three imprint variants of this edition.
Reproductions of the originals in Cambridge University Library and Bodleian Library.
Appears at reel 1627 (Cambridge University Library copy) and at reel 1684 (Bodleian Library copy).
